This game is the Definition of "Easy to Learn, Hard to Master". You'll spend hundreds of hours just practicing, learning and improving and its extremely rewarding! Landing one-deags and flick shots is extremely satisfying!
And now even Valve has started paying attention to the community and has regularly updated the game and the new operation is very warmly welcomed.
Great game, Highly Reccommended!

A game that you will always have a love/hate relationship with. It sucks sometimes and then other times it feels so rewarding. But the best way to play is with friends. Many fun times have come from this game because of that. Recommended that you learn how to play the game (spray patterns, strafing, bhop, etc.) to really get the most fun out of this game.
